directions: In a large saucepan, combine squash, zucchini, tomatoes with chiles, onion, salt and garlic powder.  Bring to a boil over medium-high heat.
Reduce heat to low and cook until tender-crisp.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers
title: Zesty Zucchini and Squash
